text: Giorgia Lo Bue (born 20 February 1994) is an Italian lightweight rower. She competes with her sister Serena in the lightweight pair event, and at the 2018 World Rowing Championships in Plovdiv, Bulgaria, they became world champions. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female rowers Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for Italy
title: Giorgia Lo Bue
